description.ko: 인공 조명의 잔상이 결코 사라지지 않는 첨단 도시의 풍경을 탐험해 보세요. 고도의 기술력이 도시 거리의 거친 이면을 감싸고 있습니다.
description.en: Explore a high-tech urban landscape where the glow of artificial lights never fades and advanced technology masks the grit of the city streets.

prompt: Cinematic shot of a sprawling cyberpunk megacity at night, rain-slicked asphalt streets reflecting vibrant neon signs in cyan and magenta, futuristic flying vehicles weaving between towering skyscrapers, dense fog at the ground level, highly detailed cybernetic architecture, hyper-realistic 8k, volumetric lighting, moody atmosphere.
